title: Alissa Walker to talk about public transit with John Mulaney tonight on his Netflix talk show
author: Paul Petrunia
excerpt: Alissa Walker, LA-based architecture writer and
text: anchor Alissa Walker, LA-based architecture writer and "walker", will be making an appearance on tonight’s episode of Everybody's Live with John Mulaney. She shared the lineup for tonight’s show, putting her in very good company with Sigourney Weaver, Natasha Lyonne, Amy Sedaris, and art-pop musician Yeule. Everybody’s Live has a history of digging into local issues such as freeways, palm trees, housing, and other planning curiosities, so tonight’s conversation, which Walker hints at addressing public transportation, should be quite interesting to locals and planning peeps.
html:
• anchor

    Alissa Walker, LA-based architecture writer and "walker", will be making an appearance on tonight’s episode of Everybody's Live with John Mulaney. She shared the lineup for tonight’s show, putting her in very good company with Sigourney Weaver, Natasha Lyonne, Amy Sedaris, and art-pop musician Yeule.

    Everybody’s Live has a history of digging into local issues such as freeways, palm trees, housing, and other planning curiosities, so tonight’s conversation, which Walker hints at addressing public transportation, should be quite interesting to locals and planning peeps.
